columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the Maintenance Window.

columns.name: window_id
columns.description: The ID of the Maintenance Window.

columns.name: enabled
columns.description: Indicates whether the Maintenance Window is enabled.

columns.name: allow_unassociated_targets
columns.description: Indicates whether targets must be registered with the Maintenance Window before tasks can be defined for those targets.

columns.name: description
columns.description: A description of the Maintenance Window.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags assigned to the Maintenance Window

columns.name: duration
columns.description: The duration of the Maintenance Window in hours.

columns.name: cutoff
columns.description: The number of hours before the end of the Maintenance Window that Systems Manager stops scheduling new tasks for execution.

columns.name: schedule
columns.description: The schedule of the Maintenance Window in the form of a cron or rate expression.

columns.name: schedule_offset
columns.description: The number of days to wait to run a Maintenance Window after the scheduled CRON expression date and time.

columns.name: created_date
columns.description: The date the maintenance window was created.

columns.name: end_date
columns.description: The date and time, in ISO-8601 Extended format, for when the maintenance window is scheduled to become inactive. The maintenance window will not run after this specified time.

columns.name: schedule_timezone
columns.description: The schedule of the maintenance window in the form of a cron or rate expression.

columns.name: start_date
columns.description: The date and time, in ISO-8601 Extended format, for when the maintenance window is scheduled to become active.

columns.name: modified_date
columns.description: The date the Maintenance Window was last modified.

columns.name: next_execution_time
columns.description: The next time the maintenance window will actually run, taking into account any specified times for the Maintenance Window to become active or inactive.
